mapper.update: update apply set pcode = '입금확인' where mseq=#{mseq}
mapper.select: select apseq from apply where mseq=#{mseq} and year=#{year}
select count(*) from member where mid=#{mid}
select * from member where mid=#{mid} and mpw=#{mpw} and mwithdraw='N'
select mseq, mid, mphone, mpw, mname, mbirth, memail, maddress, mgender, mmailreceive from member where mseq = #{mseq} order by mseq

select rnum, mseq, mid, mphone, mpw, mname, mbirth, memail, maddress, mgender, mmailreceive, mauth, mauthtoken, mregdate from ( select rownum rnum, mseq, mid, mphone, mpw, mname, mbirth, memail, maddress, mgender, mmailreceive, mauth, mauthtoken, mregdate from (select mseq, mid, mphone, mpw, mname, mbirth, memail, maddress, mgender, mmailreceive, mauth, mauthtoken, mregdate from MEMBER where mgubun != 'A' order by mseq desc) t) where rnum >= #{sseq} and rnum <= #{eseq}
mapper.insert: insert into member(mseq, mid, mphone, mpw, mname, mbirth, memail, maddress, mgender, mmailreceive, mauth, mauthtoken, mregdate) values(MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mid}, #{mphone}, #{mpw}, #{mname}, to_date(#{mbirth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{memail}, #{maddress}, #{mgender} , #{mmailreceive}, #{mauth}, #{mauthtoken}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update member set mwithdraw='Y' where mseq=#{mseq}
